description: This file defines a RecyclerView adapter and associated ViewHolder for displaying a delivery timeline with various stages, including icons, labels, and timing information.

classes.name: DeliveryTimelineRow
classes.description: Data class representing a row in the delivery timeline, including stage info, completion and current status, and timing texts.

classes.name: DeliveryTimelineAdapter
classes.description: RecyclerView adapter managing a list of DeliveryTimelineRow objects to display a delivery timeline.

methods.name: submit
methods.description: Updates the adapter's data set with new delivery timeline rows and refreshes the display.

methods.name: onCreateViewHolder
methods.description: Creates and returns a new ViewHolder for a delivery timeline item.

methods.name: getItemCount
methods.description: Returns the number of items in the adapter.

methods.name: onBindViewHolder
methods.description: Binds data to the ViewHolder at the specified position.
